nodes.text: CL-A1 Alderinium Cylinoid was an ammunition container used during the Cold War. Holding a small quantity of refined Alderinium pellets, it was placed into CL-A1 Combat Clip designed to rapidly fill shells with material fed from a cylinoid, which was then connected to the power component of a combat rifle via CL-A1 Transfer Coil.
CL-A1 Alderinium Cylinoid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Trooper class mission on Quesh.
